resources.string: You start the game with three lives. You miss one life for every wrong question.
In this mode, you have to answer all questions correctly. Any wrong question means game over!
You have 60 seconds to answer as much questions as possible. Every right question gives a 5 seconds bonus to the time, but every wrong one gives a 2 seconds penalty.
Here you can select which questions you want to play with
Questions about League of Legends lore
Questions about item stats and appearance
Questions about League of Legends champions
If checked the application will play sound effects
